channel.title: Adding mining?
channel.description:
How do i add mining in a 317?
were you mine it and then you get xp and gold? copper rock
tin rock - 100k gold - 500 xp
iron rock - 100k gold - 500 xp
coal rock 200k - (good xp amount)
gold - 300k (good xp amount)
mithril 300k (good xp amount)
adamant 400k (good xp amount)
runite 500k (good xp amount)
